mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO ld_relation_group_member (group_id, member_id, modify_time) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{memberId}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE IGNORE FROM ld_relation_group_member WHERE group_id = #{groupId}
mapper.select: SELECT auth_register_user.id, username, email, phone, first_name, last_name, level, active_time, last_online_time, auth_register_user.create_time, device_model, rom_version, ui_version, gender, icon, profile, bvision, btv FROM ld_relation_group_member, auth_register_user WHERE ld_relation_group_member.group_id = #{groupId} AND ld_relation_group_member.member_id = auth_register_user.id ORDER BY auth_register_user.username
